column4: my G15 has a dead something, and instead of having user controlled lighting the LED's just turn on and off on there own... I win :D
u dont win, if i press ctrl+alt it sends me computer into an epileptic fit for exactly 3.32 minuts ,. then returns to normal

I presume thats sarcasm, but if not I'd recommend getting a new keyboard, they has the power to take out motherboards... In fact plugging a PS/2 in while computer is on can even do that, moreso on old computers, but i found out the hard/fun way - seeing as it wasnt my computer
my screen goes black,.,. then fills with ascii charcters then flash's violently for 3 minutes , then returns to normal,. and i will get a new keyboard when i get Â£40,.,.;~)
